metadata.title: CVE-2020-8793 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: OpenSMTPD before 6.6.4 allows local users to read arbitrary files (e.g., on some Linux distributions) because of a combination of an untrusted search path in makemap.c and race conditions in the offline functionality in smtpd.c.

criterions.comment: opensmtpd package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.6.4p1-1').
